function writeLine( line, cells) for i=1, strlen(cells) do local c = strsub(cells,i,i) if(c =="#") then set_stone("st-glass",i-1,line) elseif(c =="=") then set_stone("st-door-h",i-1,line) elseif(c =="D") then set_stone("st-death",i-1,line) elseif(c =="w") then set_stone("st-wood",i-1,line) elseif(c =="<") then set_stone("st-oneway-w",i-1,line) set_item("it-cross",i-1,line) elseif(c ==">") then set_stone("st-oneway-e",i-1,line) elseif(c =="K") then set_stone("st-chess_black",i-1,line) elseif(c =="E") then set_stone("st-mail-e",i-1,line) elseif(c =="W") then set_stone("st-bolder-w",i-1,line) set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line) elseif(c =="X") then set_stone("st-glass",i-1,line) set_item("it-cherry",i-1,line) elseif(c =="t") then set_floor("fl-thief",i-1,line) elseif(c =="x") then set_floor("fl-swamp",i-1,line) elseif(c ==".") then set_item("it-seed",i-1,line) elseif(c =="!") then if not difficult then set_item("it-seed",i-1,line) else set_item("it-seed_volcano",i-1,line) end elseif(c =="p") then set_item("it-puller-s",i-1,line) elseif(c =="*") then set_item("it-trigger",i-1,line) elseif(c =="1") then set_item("it-pipe-v",i-1,line) elseif(c =="2") then set_item("it-pipe-h",i-1,line) elseif(c =="3") then set_item("it-pipe-wn",i-1,line) elseif(c =="4") then set_item("it-pipe-es",i-1,line) elseif(c =="5") then set_item("it-pipe-ne",i-1,line) elseif(c =="6") then set_item("it-pipe-sw",i-1,line) elseif(c =="O") then oxyd(i-1,line) elseif(c =="0") then set_actor("ac-blackball",i-0.5,line+0.5,{player="0"}) end end end
